tstt_item_pruuf_of_stronkestnis.name: Pruuf Of Stronkestnis
tstt_item_pruuf_of_stronkestnis.description: Zis pruufs zet yu ar ze stronkest in ze worlt.
tstt_item_pruuf_of_stronkestnis.flavorText: Obtained in a duell with Lurtz, Cold-Blooded Leader of the Uruk-Hai, this medal symbolizes strength and courage to every ork.

tstt_item_axe_ze_stronkest.flavorText: Lurtz, Cold-Blooded Leader of the Uruk-Hai, received this axe by killing the former tribal chief Boldog, The Stronk. Where Lurtz' former weapon resides is unknown.
tstt_item_axe_ze_stronkest.name: Ze Stronkest
